layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 262x18 [color=#0000EE] [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 262x18
            text run at (0,0) width 262: "This link should have green background."
        LayoutText {#text} at (261,0) size 156x18
          text run at (261,0) width 156: " (Don't follow this link.)"
